title: (x) Simple sans used in navigation on devthought.com website - Avenir {Andrew Chipman}
content:
Hey Guys.

Just wondering, anyone got any idea what this font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/menu_5131.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Light sans caps w/ alternates - Fedra Display {Conor}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212919/http:/typophile.com/node/43498 "Go to previous forum topic") [Cool contemporary connected script on AnOtherMan magazine cover ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212919/http:/typophile.com/node/43442 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JamesP

comments.content:
[http://devthought.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328212919/http:/devthought.com/ "http://devthought.com/") top menu?

Sorry if I have misunderstood you.

Looks like Avenir Heavy/Black to me. It’s too small for me to figure otherwise. Can’t make out the termini.

The B in ’ABOUT” makes me think Century Gothic, but the bowl of the R is too big to be CG.

One of the two.

It’s Avenir! :) Thanks so much, I knew I had the font somewhere on my system.

Cheers!
